thread.title: Forget Humans Vs. Machines: It’s A Humans + Machines Future
thread.title_full: Forget Humans Vs. Machines: It’s A Humans + Machines Future

author: Farah Mohamed
title: Forget Humans Vs. Machines: It’s A Humans + Machines Future
text:
Forget Humans Vs. Machines: It’s A Humans + Machines Future “I think the key question is: What’s the price of not knowing?” Singularity University Posted: 10/19/2015 07:35 AM EDT Javier Pierini via Getty Images 
Forget humans versus machines: humans plus machines is what will drive society forward. This was the central message conveyed by Dr. John Kelly, senior vice president of IBM Research, at the Augmenting Human Intelligence Cognitive Colloquium, which took place yesterday in San Francisco.
